tool.name: Srg2wig
tool.help:
**Syntax**
This tool converts srg tables into variableStep wiggle tables.
If your input looks like this::
chr2 16447976 1.08385 chr2 16447977 0.01 chr4 16417846 1.26935 chr4 16418578 1.54405
it will be converted into this::
variableStep chrom=chr2 16447976 1.08385 16447977 0.01 variableStep chrom=chr4 16417846 1.26935 16418578 1.54405
